But don't worry, they're lemon!
Let's get started!
The things you will need will be:
1/4 cup of water,
1 cup of fresh lemon juice,
2 cups of sugar,
2 tablespoons of corn syrup,
Lemon yellow food coloring,
and a shave ice maker.
Let's put it all together!
This recipe is super simple.
We're just going to add all of the ingredients to this pot.
I'm gonna pour in the lemon juice, you pour in the sugar.
